author: pdobacz
content:
Happy to let everyone know, the EOFv1 EIPs are now aligned with the [EOFv1 Megaspec document](https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/blob/main/spec/eof.md). You can see the list of individual EIPs in the [EOFv1 Meta EIP](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7692).

There are two changes we have in the pipeline, addressing recent feedback:
- [removal of `TXCREATE` opcode, the `InitcodeTransaction` type and the special creator contract](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8522). The [Megaspec](https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/blob/main/spec/eof.md) already has these changes applied.
- [a tweak to the EOF validation of creation opcodes](https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/pull/86)

author: big_tech_sux
content: i think at the very least, this should be in the considerations/rationale section of the relevant EIPs, so that people evaluating EOF are aware that of the tradeoffs
